description:
After 14 years of steering Android’s engineering efforts, Dave Burke has announced his retirement from his vice president role. In a post on X, Burke said, “it’s time for a change,” signalling the end of his tenure that saw Android grow from a fledgling platform to a global powerhouse. Burke joined Google in 2007 and... Read more »

The post Dave Burke retires as VP of Android engineering appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: Dave Burke retires as VP of Android engineering
